mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM_TBL ( ITEM_NO, CG_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_MANUFACTURE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_UP_FOLDER, ITEM_IMG, ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_BUY, ITEM_SHORT_DETAIL, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_UPDATEDATE, GRADE, GEN, RAM_TYPE, M2, F_FACTOR ) VALUES ( SEQ_ITEM_TBL.NEXTVAL, #{cg_code}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_discount}, #{item_manufacture}, #{item_content}, #{item_up_folder}, #{item_img}, #{item_amount}, #{item_buy}, #{item_short_detail}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{grade}, #{gen}, #{ram_type}, #{m2}, #{f_factor} )
